name: Lavender
description: Lavender is a calming purple flower used for peace, love, and restful sleep. Medicinally, it reduces anxiety and mild pain.
warning: Generally safe. Avoid concentrated oil on broken skin. May cause drowsiness.

name: Chamomile
description: Chamomile promotes relaxation, digestion, and sleep. Used magically for harmony and protection.
warning: Avoid if allergic to ragweed. Mild sedative effects.

name: Calendula
description: Calendula heals skin, reduces inflammation, and promotes confidence and protection.
warning: Topical use preferred. Avoid internal use during pregnancy.

name: Comfrey
description: Comfrey speeds wound healing and tissue repair. Used magically for restoration.
warning: DO NOT ingest. Can cause serious liver damage.

name: Sage
description: Sage clears negativity, purifies spaces, and improves clarity.
warning: Avoid excessive internal use. Can trigger seizures in large doses.

name: Rue
description: Rue banishes negativity and strengthens intuition.
warning: TOXIC if ingested. Can cause skin irritation and miscarriage.

name: Witch Hazel
description: Witch Hazel purifies energy and heals skin irritation.
warning: External use recommended. Internal use can irritate stomach.

name: Angelica
description: Angelica wards off evil and supports digestion and immunity.
warning: Avoid during pregnancy. Can increase sun sensitivity.

name: Mugwort
description: Mugwort enhances dreams, visions, and spiritual protection.
warning: Avoid during pregnancy. Can cause allergic reactions.

name: Yarrow
description: Yarrow boosts psychic awareness and heals wounds.
warning: Avoid during pregnancy. May cause skin sensitivity.

name: Vervain
description: Vervain enhances divination, dreams, and relaxation.
warning: Avoid long-term use. Can lower blood pressure.

name: Moonwort
description: Moonwort aids insight, spiritual travel, and protection.
warning: Rare plant. Not for casual medicinal use.

name: Rosemary
description: Rosemary boosts memory, clarity, and protection.
warning: Avoid high doses. Can raise blood pressure.

name: Ginseng
description: Ginseng enhances stamina, immunity, and mental focus.
warning: Avoid if hypertensive. Can cause insomnia.

name: Ashwagandha
description: Ashwagandha reduces stress and boosts resilience.
warning: Avoid with thyroid conditions. Can cause drowsiness.

name: Peppermint
description: Peppermint energizes, aids digestion, and clears the mind.
warning: Avoid excessive use. Can trigger acid reflux.

name: Hawthorn
description: Hawthorn is a guardian tree linked to the heart, courage, and emotional healing. Magically, it protects sacred spaces and strengthens relationships. Medicinally, it supports cardiovascular health and eases anxiety.
warning: Avoid combining with heart medications. Not for long-term unsupervised use.

name: Passionflower
description: Passionflower promotes peace, emotional stability, and spiritual calm. Magically, it supports meditation, dreamwork, and harmonious relationships. Medicinally, it reduces anxiety, relieves insomnia, and supports the nervous system.
warning: Can cause drowsiness. Avoid combining with sedatives or antidepressants.

name: Basil
description: Basil attracts prosperity and love and aids digestion.
warning: Avoid large medicinal doses. Blood-thinning effects.

name: Meadowsweet
description: Meadowsweet brings joy and relieves pain and fevers.
warning: Avoid if allergic to aspirin. Blood-thinning effects.
